net.pandoragames.util.file

Class CP437InputStreamReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • net.pandoragames.util.file.CP437InputStreamReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class CP437InputStreamReader
extends java.io.Reader
    A special InputStreamReader for binary files. Uses code page 437 (DOS) to display "unprintable" characters with two modifications:
    • 0x00 (NULL) is rendered as Ø (Unicode 0x00D8).
    • 0xFF (Non breaking space) is rendered as □ (Unicode 0x25a1).
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner
